examples.example: 我在欣赏这些精美的图片时，感受到了艺术的魅力。

translate.english: When I was enjoying these exquisite pictures, I felt the charm of art.

examples.example: 我看着墙上的图片，回忆起了许多美好的过往。

translate.english: I looked at the picture on the wall and recalled many wonderful past events.

examples.example: 我常常翻阅那些图片，它们总能给我带来愉悦的心情。

translate.english: I often look through those pictures, and they can always bring me a pleasant mood.
